00011 class Log

00014   Verbosity verbosity;
00015 public:
00021   void setVerbosity(Params & params)
00022   {
00023     verbosity.vValue(FRAME) = params.frame.verbosity;
00024     verbosity.vValue(ALGORITHM) = params.algorithm.verbosity;
00025     verbosity.vValue(ATTENUATION) = params.attenuation.verbosity;
00026     verbosity.vValue(RANDOM) = params.randoms.verbosity;
00027     verbosity.vValue(NORMALIZATION) = params.normalization.verbosity;
00028     verbosity.vValue(MOTIONCORRECTION) = params.motionCorrection.verbosity;
00029     verbosity.vValue(RESOLUTIONMODEL) = params.resolutionModel.verbosity;
00030     verbosity.vValue(SCATTER) =  params.modelBasedScatter.verbosity;
00031     verbosity.vValue(SINOGRAM) = params.sinogram.verbosity;
00032   };
00033                 
00040   int getVerbosity(verbType vt)
00041   {
00042     return verbosity.vValue(vt);
00043   };
00044                 
00052   void outputMessage(string  msg, verbType vt, int vv)
00053   {
00054     if(vv<=getVerbosity(vt))
00055       cout<<msg<<endl;
00056     cout.flush();
00057   };
00068   void outputMessage(ostream & os, string  msg, verbType vt, int vv)
00069   {
00070     if(vv<=getVerbosity(vt))
00071       os<<msg<<endl;
00072     os.flush();
00073   };
00074                 
00079   static Log * getLog()
00080   {
00081     static Log log;
00082     return &log;
00083   };
